metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2050 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The get_abbrev_array_info function in libdwarf-20151114 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds write) via a crafted elf file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2050` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

dwarfdump - 20120410-2+deb7u2build0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dwarfutils package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '20120410-2+deb7u2build0.14.04.1').
